meanings.meaning: the needs of the present and future generations

vlive.korean: 정말 이거 재밌는 가사와 현세대가 많이 쓰는 단어죠. You hear very fun lyrics. And the word that's going viral. 듣기 View video BTS : [FULL]방탄늬우스 COMEBACK SPECIAL ('BTS NEWS' COMEBACK SPECIAL)
vlive.english: You hear very fun lyrics. And the word that's going viral.

examples.korean: The restriction has faced fierce resistance from students, as the current generation of students has been exposed to influences promoting the values of freedom of expression as one of the highest values of human life. 발음듣기 이 규정은 학생들에게서 거센 반발을 사고 있는데, 그것은 현 세대의 학생들이 표현의 자유를 추구하는 것은 인간의 삶에 있어 가장 중요하다는 사고에 익숙해져 있기 때문이다. Neungyule
examples.english: The restriction has faced fierce resistance from students, as the current generation of students has been exposed to influences promoting the values of freedom of expression as one of the highest values of human life. 발음

examples.korean: There is one thing that must be crystal clear to the current generation. 발음듣기 현 세대에게 명백한 사실이 하나 있다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: There is one thing that must be crystal clear to the current generation. 발음

examples.korean: I am very concerned about this generation’s incessant need for ease and instant communication. 발음듣기 난 현 세대의 끊임없는 안락함에 대한 요구와 순간적인 의사소통에 대해 걱정하고 있다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: I am very concerned about this generation’s incessant need for ease and instant communication. 발음

examples.korean: To the current generation of basketball fans, Jordan may be better known for his product endorsements. 발음듣기 현 세대의 농구 팬들에게 Jordan은 자신의 (유명인이 광고에 나와 하는 상품에 대한)홍보로 더 잘 알려져 있을 수도 있다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: To the current generation of basketball fans, Jordan may be better known for his product endorsements. 발음

examples.korean: So it must be with this generation of Americans. 발음듣기 그래서 현 세대의 미국인들도 그래야 합니다. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 메르베이(psys****) Web Collection
examples.english: So it must be with this generation of Americans. 발음
